title: Wiggle starts Black Friday a month early: Here are the best deals
content:
Cyclist
Wiggle starts Black Friday a month early: Here are the best deals

Wiggle and Chain Reaction Cycles have started their Black Friday sales a whole month before actual ‘Black Friday’ on 24th November. After reports of parent company WiggleCRC’s self-administration by Cycling Electric last week there has been public anticipation of a sale, though not a Black Friday sale. Whether this is covering both bases remains to be seen.

But Black Friday sale or administration sale, it’s a sale, so we’ve had a look through and picked out what we think are the best deals to be had. We’ll be adding more throughout the day/week/month.

There is so so so much stuff with big discounts, which are the same on both Wiggle and Chain Reaction, so it’s definitely worth trawling through yourself.

Related Posts

Wiggle begins self-administration, Cycling Electric reports

Deals

Best gifts for cyclists: Presents for the cyclist in your life

Best Wiggle Black Friday deals

  • Fulcrum Racing 5 disc road wheelset – 57% off (£189.99)
  • Northwave Extreme GT 3 road shoes – 50% off (£115)
  • Oakley Jawbreaker sunglasses – 40% off (£168)
  • Castelli Perfetto RoS long sleeve jersey – 45% off (£120)
  • Assos RS Rain Cycling Booties – 46% off (£43.33)
  • Shimano 105 R7000 11 speed rim brake groupset – 40% off (£419.99)
  • Shimano Dura Ace R9100 11 speed cassette 11-52 – 52% off (£110.99)
  • Dhb Blok Classic thermal bib tights – 40% off (£48)
  • Tacx Neo 2 smart trainer – 46% off (£649.99)
  • Poc Ventral Lite helmet – 58% off (£99.99)
  • Selle Italia saddles – 61-77% off
  • Vitus Vitesse Evo Red AXS road bike – 30% off (£3,849.99)
  • Deda Superzero alloy handlebars – 85% off (£15.99)
  • Topeak Mini Morph pump – 50% off (£14.99)
  • Fizik Tempo R5 Overcure road shoes – 40% off (£95.99)
  • Dhb waterproof rucksack – 42% off (£35)
  • Bont Riot Road+ shoes – 77% off (£34.09)
  • Vittoria Pave CG Open road tyres – 51% off (£19.99)
  • Shimano S-Phyre RC902 road shoes – 40% off (£191.99)
  • 3T Aeroghiaia LTD Gravel handlebars – 75% off (£79.99)
  • GripGrab Ride Lightweight Padded short finger glove – 60% off (£8.78)
  • Vitus 16 kids bike – 30% off (£229.99)
  • Castelli Gabba RoS jersey – 45% off (£104.50)
  • 100% S2 sunglasses – 55% off (£85.49)
  • dhb medium saddle bag – 81% off (£3.49)
  • Topeak drybag wedge Quickclick saddle bag – 60% off (£16.99)
  • Oakley Sutro sunglasses – 30% off (£106.49)
  • Bookman Curve rear light – 54% off (£15.99)
  • Sidi Wire 2 carbon matt road shoes – 45% off (£214.99)
  • Giro Regime road cycling shoes – 45% off (£126.49)
  • 4iiii Precision Dura-Ace R9100 power meter – 30% off (£299.99)
  • Kask Protone road cycling helmet – 50% off (£112)
  • Lifeline Xplova NOZA smart trainer – 43% off (£399.99)
  • SKS Raceblade Pro mudguards – 30% off (£34.99)
  • dhb toe cover overshoes – 33% off (£10)
  • Exposure Zenith MK1 front light – 37% off (£184.99)
  • Lifeline essential torque wrench set – 38% off (£24.99)
  • Osprey Siskin 8 backpack – 55% off (£38)

Fulcrum Racing 5 Disc road wheelset | 57% off

£189.99 (RRP £439) | View offer

Available with a Shimano, SRAM or Campag freehub, the Fulcrum Racing 5 disc brake wheelset could be a great addition to your winter bike set up. The rims are aluminium, with a 20mm internal diameter, and the wheels are designed for endurance road riding.

Northwave Extreme GT 3 road shoes | 50% off

£115 (RRP £229.99) | View offer

The Extreme GT road shoes blend Northwave’s top tier technology with a 12 (out of 15) stiffness grade sole, which claims an efficient power transfer while still comfortable enough for day to day riding. If the brand is good enough for Filippo Ganna…?

Oakley Jawbreaker dual lens photochromic sunglasses | 40% off

£168 (RRP £280) | View offer

This Oakley Jawbreaker bundle includes both a Prizm road lens and a Photochromic clear-to-black lens to pair with the iconic frame. They claim an extended field of vision, lightweight frame and comfortable ear and nose pads, and also use Switchlock technology to allow quick changes between the two lenses.

Castelli Perfetto RoS long sleeve jersey | 45% off

£120 (RRP £220) | View offer

The Perfetto RoS is up there as one of the most beloved jackets in cycling and is currently available at a huge discount. There are also loads of other big deals on Castelli kit to be had, see them all here.

Assos RS Rain Cycling Booties | 46% off

£43.33 (RRP £80) | View offer

Normally overly expensive and now palatable, these Assos overshoes are great for wet weather, which is most of the time in the UK right now. Check out our full review if you’re not sure or if you’re after something that brings warmth over rain protection, try the Dhb Neoprene Nylon overshoes, which are reduced to just £20.

Shimano 105 R7020 11 speed rim brake groupset | 40% off

£419.99 (RRP £699.99) | View offer

For those ready to mourn the loss of Shimano 11 speed, your moment is here as the rim brake 105 groupset is currently on offer at 40% off (before they run out of stock, the disc brake version already has).

Shimano Dura Ace R9100 11 speed cassette 11-25 | 52% off

£110.99 (RRP £229.99) | View offer

Bike maintenance is expensive and nothing more so than needing a new cassette. If you’re after a flashy Dura Ace number, you’re in luck. There are also offers on lots of other Shimano products, available here.

Dhb Blok Classic Thermal bib tights | 40% off

£48 (RRP £80) | View offer

It won’t come as a surprise that there is an unbelievable amount (well, believable but it’s a lot) of Dhb kit discounted, check it all out here.

Tacx Neo 2 SE smart trainer | 46% off

£649.99 (RRP £1,199.99) | View offer

It’s getting towards indoor training season and this is a bargain for a popular turbo. The SE means it’s mostly the same as the Neo 2, but has the axle of the 2T, which offers native through axle compatibility.

Poc Ventral Lite helmet | 58% off

£99.99 (RRP £240) | View offer

Poc is another brand with a strong selection, with stock of certain colours and sizes already on the way down. The Ventral Lite is its super-lightweight helmet weighing a claimed 200g, for the weight weenies or just anyone trying to save a gram or two. A £140 discount is certainly appealing. Check all the discounted Poc helmets and sunglasses here.

Sella Italia saddles | 61-77% off

View offers

The discounts on Sella Italia saddles are so big and good that it wasn’t worth singling just one out, so view the whole lot here.

Vitus Vitesse EVO Red AXS road bike | 30% off

£3,849.99 (RRP 5,499.99) | View offer

The Vitesse EVO road bike is the most expensive of the Vitus bikes on sale with SRAM’s top level Red AXS wireless groupset, it also has the biggest price reduction. This bike (with SRAM Force) scored 4.5/5 stars when we reviewed it in 2021. This one not for you? There’s 30% off every single Vitus bike – see them all here.

Deda Superzero Alloy handlebars | 85% off

£15.99 (RRP £109.99) | View offer

Yes that is fifteen pounds and ninety-nine pence. Down almost one hundred pounds. It’s only £1 more expensive than this mini pump…

Topeak Mini Morph pump | 50% off

£14.99 (RRP £29.99) | View offer

Mini pumps are essential. Topeak’s Mini Morph is made to fill up to 160psi, is compatible with Presta, Schrader and Dunlop valves, and fits in your bag.

Fizik Tempo R5 Overcurve road shoes | 40% off

£95.99 (RRP £159.99) | View offer

This one’s another discounted because Fizik is no longer making them, very stylish road shoes with a nylon composite sole.

Dhb Waterproof Rucksack | 42% off

£35 (RRP £60) | View offer

Commuting in winter? A waterproof bag is a must-have. There are a few Dhb rucksacks available in the sale but this 25L bag made for bad weather just had to be included.

Bont Riot Road+ shoes | 77% off

£34.09 (RRP £149.99) | View offer

It’s not the prettiest shoe you’ve ever seen but £30 is unbelievable value, even if Bont does call them ‘entry-level’. Take our word for it.

Vittoria Pave CG Open road tyres | 51% off

£19.99 (RRP 40.99) | View offer

Not the newest tyre on the market, but that doesn’t mean it’s not good. It could be an ideal winter tyre.

Shimano S-Phyre RC902 road shoes | 40% off

£191.99 (RRP £319.99) | View offer

There’s only one size of these left as this model of Shimano’s top tier road shoes has recently(ish) been replaced, so fingers crossed it’s yours.

3T Aeroghiaia LTD Gravel handlebars | 75% off

£79.99 (RRP £315.99) | View offer

Carbon bars made for improved aerodynamics and gravel racing (ie. they have flat tops and flared drops).

GripGrab Ride Lightweight Padded short finger glove | 60% off

£8.78 (RRP £21.95) | View offer

It’s getting to the end of short finger glove season but you can’t go wrong with GripGrab gloves, so stock up for next year while they’re less than £9.

Vitus 16 kids bike | 30% off

£229.99 (RRP £329.99) | View offer

Christmas is saved, £100 off your kid’s next bike, this is just one of the many on offer though, there are loads of kids bikes discounted in various sizes, check them all out here.

Castelli Gabba RoS jersey | 45% off

£104.50 (RRP £190) | View offer

The Castelli Gabba is one of the most iconic cycling products ever made, and this trendy blackout edition jersey has a wedge off and a full range of sizes available.

100% S2 sunglasses | 55% off

£85.49 (RRP £189.99) | View offer

Another brand with a boat load big boy bargains is 100%, including the Hypercraft, Speedcraft, Speedtrap, Glendale, S3 and the S2, like this one. See the whole range here.

dhb medium saddle bag | 81% off

£3.49 (RRP £18) | View offer

It’s literally three pounds fifty.

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£3.49)

Topeak Drybag Wedge Quickclick saddle bag | 60% off

£16.99 (RRP £41.99) | View offer

It’s not £3.50 but it’s a fully waterproof saddle bag and attaches onto the seat post with the quickclick mount.

Oakley Sutro sunglasses | 30% off

£106.49 (RRP £152) | View offer

One of the most popular glasses in the world over the past few years, seen on the faces of many of the best road racers. These are low in stock so be quick.

Bookman Curve rear light | 54% off

£15.99 (RRP £34.99) | View offer

It’s light season and this rear light is bright, rechargeable and easy to attach with its elastic silicone band.

Sidi Wire 2 carbon matt road shoes | 45% off

£214.49 (RRP £390) | View offer

A chunk of one of Sidi’s best shoes? Yes please. That’s not all, this is just the start, there are loads of discounts on the Sidi range including Sidi Sixtys and Shot 2s, check all the deals out here.

Giro Regime road cycling shoes | 45% off

£126.49 (RRP £229.99) | View offer

These are good shoes, that is a good price.

4iiii Precision Dura-Ace R9100 power meter | 30% off

£299.99 (RRP £429) | View offer

If you don’t have a power meter, this £130 saving could prove handy.

Kask Protone road cycling helmet | 50% off

£112 (RRP £225) | View offer

Kask are another with several big discounts including the Valegro, Wasabi and Utopia, see them all here.

Lifeline Xplova NOZA smart trainer | 43% off

£399.99 (RRP £699.99) | View offer

A smart trainer for £400 is good value.

SKS Raceblade Pro mudguards | 30% off

£34.99 (RRP £50) | View offer

It’s mudguard season, it’s been mudguard season, and these are clip-on mudguards meaning you don’t need mounts on your bike.

dhb toe cover overshoes | 33% off

£10 (RRP £15) | View offer

You won’t get cold feet about this purchase.

Exposure Zenith MK1 front light | 37% off

£184.99 (RRP £295) | View offer

The Exposure Zenith is a beast of a light that can either go on your bars or on your helmet.

Lifeline essential torque wrench set | 38% off

£24.99 (RRP £39.99) | View offer

In the modern world of bikes everyone need a torque wrench set in their collection.

Osprey Siskin 8 backpack | 55% off

£38 (RRP £85) | View offer

Backpacks are back in. Whether it’s an adventure or a race, over road or gravel, having a bag that can fit your bits and pieces and house a hydration pack sounds like a no-brainer.

author: Will Strickson | Deputy Website Editor
